remixlab.dandelion.ik

Class Solver

  • java.lang.Object
    • remixlab.dandelion.ik.Solver
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Solver.CCDSolver, Solver.FABRIKSolver

    public abstract class Solver
extends java.lang.Object
    A Solver is a convenient class to solve IK problem Given a Chain or a Tree Structure of Frames, this class will solve the configuration that the frames must have to reach a desired position
